subheader: Be part of the collectively designed PermaplanT world! You can pay your annual membership fee or earn it through your active participation in the form of 'Permacoins'.

pro.name: Supporting Member
pro.description: As a supporting member, you not only become a legal member of the association and enjoy the features of the app, community, and our support, but you also enable a person with lower financial means to become a member. Thank you!

starter.name: Standard Membership
starter.description: With a standard membership, you become a legal member of the association and enjoy the features of the app, community, and our support.

collab.name: Participation Membership
collab.description: For a participation membership, you need at least 50 Permacoins. If you reach this amount or more by the end of the year, no annual fee in Euro will be charged for you.

email_text: I want to apply for following membership:
subject: Membership application
